title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of deaths, with a total of 5 data points.
Overall Number of deaths has decreased over the Year
Number of deaths is roughly constant from 2009/2010 to 2012/2013, and lastly gradually decreasing from 2012/2013 to 2013/2014.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2012/2013 and 2013/2014.
Max Number of deaths about 6237.0 was recorded at Year 2011/2012
Min Number of deaths about 4110.0 was recorded at Year 2013/2014
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of deaths, with a total of 5 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2011/2012 to 2013/2014.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009/2010 to 2011/2012.
